subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: With the club on a two-game losing streak and a number of key players injured, its best young hope might be Gerard Deulofeu, who is playing at Everton on a transfer this season.
snippet: With the club on a two-game losing streak and a number of key players injured, its best young hope might be Gerard Deulofeu, who is playing at Everton on a transfer this season.
